mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from Teachers Health fits your upper-middle income bracket and high-risk health profile (due to hypertension) well. With comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and maternity care - all at $320 per month - it provides substantial financial protection while balancing affordability. The plan's maximum out-of-pocket expense of $5000 offers additional peace of mind in managing healthcare costs associated with your condition.
